item.title: 英伟达供应商 SK 海力士第二季度利润增长 69%，略高于预期
item.description: 韩国 SK 海力士（SK Hynix）周四公布了创纪录的季度利润，原因是对用于生成人工智能芯片组的先进芯片的需求强劲，以及一些客户在美国可能征收关税前囤积了半导体。【原文：South Korea's SK Hynix posted on Thursday a record quarterly profit, driven by strong demand for advanced chips used in generative artificial intelligence chipsets and as some customers stockpiled semiconductors ahead of potential U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: 据《每日电讯报》报道，英国电信将任命维珍媒体 O2 的科比安为首席财务官
item.description: 据《每日电讯报》周三援引未具名消息人士的话报道，英国最大的宽带和移动服务提供商英国电信集团（BT Group）将任命维珍媒体 O2 的首席财务官帕特里夏-科比安（Patricia Cobian）为其首位女性财务总监。【原文：BT Group , Britain's biggest broadband and mobile services provider, is set to name Virgin Media O2's chief financial officer, Patricia Cobian, as its first female finance chief, The Telegraph reported on Wednesday, citing unnamed sources.】

item.title: Cboe Global 将退出日本股票业务
item.description: Cboe Global Markets 周三表示，将关闭日本股票业务，包括 Cboe 日本自营交易系统和 Cboe BIDS 日本大宗交易平台。【原文：Cboe Global Markets said on Wednesday it will wind down its Japanese equities business, including the Cboe Japan proprietary trading system and Cboe BIDS Japan block trading platform.】

item.title: 龙舌兰酒制造商贝克公司因外汇收益而使利润翻了两番
item.description: 全球最大的龙舌兰酒生产商贝克公司（Becle）周三公布，由于受益于外汇收益，该公司第二季度利润比去年同期增长四倍多，超过了分析师的预测。【原文：Becle , the world's largest tequila producer, on Wednesday posted a second-quarter profit more than four times higher than a year earlier, surpassing analysts' forecasts as it benefited from foreign-exchange gains.】

item.title: 日本贸易协议给美国投资者带来希望，却让汽车制造商感到沮丧
item.description: 美国最大的几家汽车制造商--通用汽车公司、福特汽车公司和吉普车制造商斯泰兰特公司的股票周三在达成降低日本进口汽车关税的贸易协议的消息传出后大涨，因为投资者认为这是未来将达成更多协议的迹象。【原文：Shares of General Motors , Ford Motor , and Jeep-maker Stellantis , some of the biggest automakers in the U.S., rallied on Wednesday after news of a trade deal that will reduce tariffs on imported Japanese cars, as investors saw it as a sign of more deals to come.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，Neuralink 的目标是到 2031 年实现 10 亿美元的收入
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周三援引投资者文件报道，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的大脑植入公司 Neuralink 的目标是到 2031 年实现至少 10 亿美元的年收入，计划每年进行 2 万例手术。【原文：Elon Musk's brain implant company Neuralink aims to generate at least $1 billion in annual revenue by 2031, driven by plans to perform 20,000 surgeries per year, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing investor documents.】

item.title: 贸易冲突给经济前景蒙上阴影，欧洲央行将维持利率稳定
item.description: 欧洲中央银行周四将按兵不动，在连续七次降息后暂停加息，等待围绕欧洲与美国贸易关系的迷雾散去。【原文：The European Central Bank was set to keep interest rates on hold on Thursday, pausing after seven straight cuts as it waited for the fog surrounding Europe's trade relations with the United States to clear.】

item.title: 澳大利亚取消对美国牛肉的生物安全限制，AFR 报道
item.description: 据《澳大利亚金融评论报》（AFR）周四报道，澳大利亚已经取消了对从美国进口牛肉的生物安全限制，这可能会消除美国总统唐纳德-特朗普政府对双边贸易的一个主要担忧。【原文：Australia has lifted its biosecurity restrictions on beef imports from the U.S., the Australian Financial Review (AFR) reported on Thursday, likely removing a key concern for U.S. President Donald Trump's administration over bilateral trade.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，NBC 环球考虑推出体育有线网络
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周三报道，康卡斯特旗下的 NBC 环球公司正在考虑推出一个体育有线网络，该网络也将提供孔雀平台上的内容。【原文：Comcast's NBCUniversal is considering launching a sports cable network that would feature content also on its Peacock platform, the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 新加坡和澳门推动收入增长，拉斯维加斯金沙盈利超出预期
item.description: 赌场运营商拉斯维加斯金沙周三公布的第二季度利润和收入超出分析师预期，主要得益于新加坡和澳门业务的强劲表现，金沙股价在盘后交易中上涨了 4.6%。【原文：Casino operator Las Vegas Sands beat analysts' expectations for second-quarter profit and revenue on Wednesday, driven by strength in its Singapore and Macao businesses, sending its shares up 4.6% in trading after the bell.】

item.title: 阿拉斯加航空公司因旅行需求改善而恢复预测
item.description: 阿拉斯加航空集团（Alaska Air Group）周三重申了全年业绩展望，称客运量和定价能力均有所改善。【原文：Alaska Air Group on Wednesday reinstated its full-year outlook, citing improvements in both passenger traffic and pricing power.】

item.title: 皇冠城堡上调年度场地租赁收入预期，原因是租赁活动健康发展
item.description: 无线通信塔运营商皇冠城堡（Crown Castle）周三上调了年度场地租赁收入预期，暗示随着服务提供商不断扩大容量，无线运营商的租赁活动将保持健康。【原文：Wireless tower operator Crown Castle raised its annual site rental revenue forecast on Wednesday, hinting at healthy leasing activity by wireless carriers as service providers continue to augment capacity.】

item.title: 美国银行授权 400 亿美元股票回购计划
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America）周三表示，董事会已授权实施一项价值 400 亿美元的股票回购计划。【原文：Bank of America said on Wednesday its board has authorized a $40 billion stock repurchase program.】

item.title: 贝森特说美联储的预测 "带有政治偏见
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周三在没有证据的情况下暗示，美联储广受关注的经济预测是出于政治动机，因为特朗普政府正在加大对美国央行降息的压力。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent on Wednesday suggested without evidence that the Federal Reserve's widely followed economic forecasts are motivated by politics, as the Trump administration steps up pressure on the U.S. central bank to cut interest rates.】

item.title: 交易日 跟踪贸易--从阴霾到繁荣
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 由于运量增加，铁路运营商 CSX 季度利润超出预期
item.description: CSX 周三公布的第二季度利润高于分析师预期，主要得益于联运业务量的增长。【原文：CSX reported second-quarter profit above analysts' estimates on Wednesday, driven by improving intermodal volumes.】

item.title: 美国上诉称苹果在 iCloud 存储方面亏待了客户，苹果胜诉
item.description: 美国联邦上诉法院周三驳回了苹果公司用户的诉讼请求，即该公司在 iPhone 用户升级时提供给他们的 iCloud 数据存储空间少于他们支付的费用。【原文：A U.S. federal appeals court on Wednesday rejected claims by Apple customers that the iPhone maker gave them less iCloud data storage than they paid for when upgrading.】

item.title: 西南航空利润不及预期，国内需求疲软侵蚀票价
item.description: 受国内旅游需求疲软导致空座位增多和票价疲软的影响，西南航空公司周三公布的第二季度利润不及华尔街预期。【原文：Southwest Airlines missed Wall Street estimates for second-quarter profit on Wednesday, pressured by weak domestic travel demand that has led to more empty seats and softer fares.】

item.title: 美国最高法院允许特朗普暂时撤换消费品安全专员
item.description: 美国最高法院周三允许共和党总统唐纳德-特朗普解除政府最高消费品安全监督机构三名民主党成员的职务，从而加强了他对国会设立的独立于总统控制的联邦机构的控制权。【原文：The U.S. Supreme Court let Republican President Donald Trump on Wednesday remove three Democratic members of the government's top consumer product safety watchdog, boosting his power over federal agencies set up by Congress to be independent from presidential control.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，英国石油公司嘉实多部门获得 One Rock Capital Partners 的竞标
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周三援引知情人士的话报道，美国私募股权公司 One Rock Capital Partners 是英国石油公司嘉实多润滑油业务为数不多的竞购者之一。【原文：One Rock Capital Partners, a U.S. private equity firm, is one of the few remaining bidders for BP's Castrol lubricants business, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 外出就餐减少，Chipotle 下调销售预期，股价下跌
item.description: 由于经济不确定性促使手头拮据的美国人减少外出就餐，Chipotle Mexican Grill 周三第二次下调了今年的年销售额增长目标，导致这家卷饼连锁店盘后股价下跌 9.5%。【原文：Chipotle Mexican Grill on Wednesday lowered its annual sales growth target for a second time this year as economic uncertainty prompts cash-strapped Americans to dine out less, sending the burrito chain's shares down 9.5% after hours.】

item.title: ServiceNow上调年度订阅收入预期，以满足人工智能驱动的工具需求
item.description: ServiceNow 周三上调了其年度订购收入预期，这表明市场对其旨在实现数字运营自动化的人工智能软件需求强劲，并使其股价在延时交易中上涨超过 7%。【原文：ServiceNow raised its annual subscription revenue forecast on Wednesday, signaling robust demand for its artificial intelligence-enabled software designed to automate digital operations and sending its shares up more than 7% in extended trading.】

item.title: IBM业绩超预期，得益于人工智能大型机更新和咨询业务复苏
item.description: IBM周三公布的第二季度营收和利润超出华尔街预期，这主要得益于其大型机业务的销售额回升，因为人工智能升级刺激了对能够处理海量数据的系统的需求。【原文：IBM beat Wall Street estimates for second-quarter revenue and profit on Wednesday, helped by renewed sales in its mainframe business as artificial intelligence upgrades spurred demand for the systems, which are capable of processing vast amounts of data.】

item.title: T-Mobile 上调年度新增用户预期
item.description: T-Mobile 周三上调了对后付费净增用户数量的年度预期，第二季度新增无线用户数量超过预期，表明市场对这家电信巨头的顶级移动服务需求稳定。【原文：T-Mobile raised its annual forecast for postpaid net customer additions on Wednesday and added more wireless subscribers than expected in the second quarter, signaling steady demand for the telecom giant's top-tier mobile services.】

item.title: 芭比娃娃需求疲软，美泰销售额降幅超出预期
item.description: 玩具制造商美泰公司周三公布的第二季度营收降幅大于预期，原因是北美地区芭比娃娃销售疲软，以及全球贸易不确定性导致零售商谨慎规划库存，从而影响了需求。【原文：Toymaker Mattel posted a bigger-than-expected drop in second-quarter revenue on Wednesday, as weak Barbie sales in North America and cautious inventory planning by retailers amid global trade uncertainties weighed on demand.】

item.title: 谷歌母公司 Alphabet 季度营收超预期，资本支出大增
item.description: Alphabet 周三公布的第二季度业绩超出华尔街预期，并将今年的资本支出计划提高到约 850 亿美元，理由是市场对其云计算服务的巨大需求。【原文：Alphabet beat Wall Street estimates for its second quarter on Wednesday, and cited massive demand for its cloud computing services as it hiked its capital spending plans for the year to about $85 billion.】

item.title: 文件显示，雪佛龙完成对赫斯的收购后在休斯顿裁员 575 人
item.description: 德克萨斯州劳动力委员会周三提交的一份文件显示，雪佛龙公司在完成与赫斯公司价值 550 亿美元的合并后，在休斯顿地区裁减了 575 个职位。【原文：Chevron cut 575 positions in the Houston area after it completed its $55 billion merger with Hess, a Texas Workforce Commission filing revealed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 贝森特心目中的五位美联储女主席
item.description: 美联储财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周二表示，美联储五位女性地区银行行长中的一位可能会接替美国央行行长杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）--鉴于美联储12位地区银行行长中没有一位表示同意唐纳德-特朗普总统提出的立即降息的要求，这一评论耐人寻味。【原文：One of the Federal Reserve's five female regional bank presidents could replace U.S. central bank chief Jerome Powell, Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said on Tuesday - an intriguing comment given that none of the 12 Fed regional bank presidents have signaled they are on board with the immediate cut in interest rates demanded by President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 经过长期谈判，派拉蒙+赢得《南方公园》资料库和新剧集
item.description: 派拉蒙全球公司（Paramount Global）周三表示，已将与《南方公园》主创特雷-帕克（Trey Parker）和马特-斯通（Matt Stone）的合作关系再延长五年。【原文：Paramount Global has extended its partnership with "South Park" creators Trey Parker and Matt Stone for another five years, the company said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国炼油商第二季度利润或因柴油利润率上升而回升
item.description: 投资者预计，由于反常强劲的柴油利润率提高了盈利，美国顶级炼油企业第二季度利润将从今年前三个月的亏损中反弹。【原文：Investors are expecting top U.S. refiners to report higher second-quarter profits, bouncing back from losses during the first three months of the year as unseasonably strong diesel margins boost earnings.】
